channel.title: TFS Top Tip #13 - Watch where you drop stuff
channel.description: With Team Build in Team Foundation Server, you can have multiple build types for multiple projects.  For example, we have a build that runs fast that we can have running Continuous Integration on, and a slower build (that does obfuscation,...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Carlos+00:00
item.description:
Well, I figured this one out, but I would like to see if it is possible to take it one step further.
I have configured the same for my CI builds and my Dailys. I would like to make my release versions manual, but I would like to drop them in a location with the label name (\\jeeves\drop\release\2.0.3.1\. I was wondering if there was a task that would build the labeled version then drop it in the folder with the same label name. To avoid confusion, I want to drop the date suffix as well. Do you think this is possible?
item.dc:creator: Carlos
